long_description:
Inputs
------
default: DataContainer
    Any DataContainer - likely connected to the output of the OPEN_SERIAL node.
short_description: The MEASURE_VOLTAGE node queries an instrument's measured output voltage, such as a DMM or power supply.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The open serial connection with the instrument.

returns.description: The measured voltage as a Scalar or an exception error as a TextBlob.
